name: HomegearGpio::setDirection
shortDescription: Sets the direction of a GPIO.
description: This method sets the direction of a GPIO. Before calling this method, the GPIO needs to be opened with HomegearGpio::open().

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The direction to set. Possible values are HomegearGpio::DIRECTION_IN (0) and HomegearGpio::DIRECTION_OUT (1).
